VALUER Type: VALUERSDescription: Parks and Open Spaces

description: Approval of Condition 18 (Sound Transmission Reduction measures) of Planning Permission ref: 18/16440/FUL (Demolition of the existing buildings and the construction of a mixed-use development comprising a food/convenience retail store (392 sqm) at ground floor level (Use Class A1) and four residential units comprising 2 x 2 bed and 2 x 3 bed self contained units above(Use Class C3) with associated parking, loading bay, landscaping and access) dated 12/03/2019
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.

Note: You are required to complete the 'Determining whether a Development may be CIL Liable Planning Application Additional Information Requirement form'. This form can be downloaded from the planning portal at https://ecab.planningportal.co.uk/uploads/1app/forms/form_1_cil_additional_information.pdf . Please complete and return as soon as possible.
